mlm-error-title-invalid: Error message in case that a invalid title was provided
mlm-error-title-notexists:
Error message in case that a provided title does not exist
*Parameter $1 - Full page name
mlm-error-title-istalkpage:
Error message in case that a provided title is a talk page
*Parameter $1 - Full page name
mlm-error-title-nsnotallowed:
Error message in case that a provided title is in a namespace that has no translation enabled
*Parameter $1 - Full page name
mlm-error-title-isalreadytranslation:
Error message in case that a title already has a translation
*Parameter $1 - Full page name
mlm-error-title-isalreadysource:
Error message in case that a title is already declared to be the source of a translation
*Parameter $1 - Full page name
mlm-error-title-isnottranslation:
Error message in case that a page title is not translated
* Parameter $1 - Full page name
mlm-error-lang-invalid: Error message in case that a invalid language code was provided
mlm-error-lang-notallowed:
Error message in case that a specific language code is not allowed by configuration
*Parameter $1 - The language code
mlm-error-lang-alreadytraslated:
Error message in case that there is already a translation for a specific language code
*Parameter $1 - The language code
mlm-input-label-sourcetitle: Label for a textfield that allows specification of the source title
mlm-input-label-translationtitles:
Label of a section that lists translations of an article.
*Parameter $1 - Number of available translations
mlm-input-label-add:
Label for a add button, that adds a translation
{{Identical|Add translation}}
mlm-input-label-delete:
Label for a delete button, that deletes all translations.
{{Identical|Delete all translations}}
mlm-contentaction-label: Label of a content action link that opens Special:MultiLanguageManager
right-language:
Grants access to use the user interface of the MultilanguageManager extension to add, edit and delete translations.
{{doc-right|language}}
mlm-input-label-sourcetitle-section: Label for the source title section in the OOUI dialog. A very short sentence that explains that a translation can be defined for the source article given in this section.
mlm-input-label-translationtitles-sectio: Label for the translation titles section in the OOUI dialog. A very short sentence that explains that translations can be added in the selected language.
